title: Kazemakase Tsukikage Ran
opening_song: "Leave it to the Wind" by Akemi Misawa
ending_song: "Leave it to the Wind #2" by Reiko Yasuhara
sinopse: In the Edo or Tokugawa period (1600–1868), Ran, a female wandering samurai whose skill with the katana is only matched by her taste for sake (rice wine), is joined by a chinese martial artist who calls herself Lady Meow of the Iron Cat Fist. Tsukikage Ran has individual episodes that are just short stories of their adventures.
